questions.question: Icyapa gishyirwa ku binyabiziga bifite uburemere ntarengwa bwemewe burenga toni eshanu cyerekana umuvuduko ntarengwa ikinyabiziga kidashobora kurenza. kigomba kugira umurambararo:

answers.answer: a.	Uri hagati ya santimetero 18 na 21

questions.question: Umuzenguruko w’icyapa gishyirwa ku binyabiziga bifite uburemere ntarengwa bwemewe burenga toni eshanu cyerekana umuvuduko ntarengwa ikinyabiziga kidashobora kurenza ugomba kuba ari:

answers.answer: d.	Utukura kandi ubugari bugomba kugira santimetero 3
a.	Utukura kandi ubugari bugomba kugira milimetero 17
b.	Ubururu kandi ubugari bugomba kugira milimetero 45
c.	Utukura kandi ubugari bugomba kugira santimetero 30

questions.question: Ahari hejuru cyane y’ubuso bumurika h’amatara ndanga mbere na ndanga nyuma, ntihashobora kuba harenze:

answers.answer: a.	Metero 1 na cm 90 hejuru y’ubutaka, iyo ikinyabiziga kidapakiye
b.	Metero 1 na cm 20 hejuru y’ubutaka, iyo ikinyabiziga kidapakiye
c.	Metero 1 na cm 55 hejuru y’ubutaka, iyo ikinyabiziga kidapakiye
d.	Metero 1 na cm 25 hejuru y’ubutaka, iyo ikinyabiziga kidapakiye

questions.question: Imirongo yambukiranya umuhanda, igomba kuba ifite ubugari buri hagati:
Ubuso bumurika bw’amatara bukozwe n’uruziga rw’umurambararo ufite kuva

answers.answer: c.	Kuri cm 18 kugeza kuri cm 21
a.	Kuri cm 15 kugeza kuri cm 20
b.	Kuri cm 10 kugeza kuri cm 20
d.	Kuri cm 40 kugeza kuri cm 60

questions.question: Amatara magufi y’amapikipiki na velomoteri bigenda mu nzira nyabagendwa agomba gukoreshwa:

answers.answer: b.	Igihe cyose no mu buryo bwose
c.	Igihe buba bwije kugeza bukeye

questions.question: Amatara ashakisha acanwa gusa:

answers.answer: c.	Igihe ari ngombwa kandi atabangamiye abandi bayobozi
a.	Igihe cy’igihu cyangwa cy’imvura nyinshi
d.	Igihe ikinyabiziga kigenda mu nzira ifunganye irimo amakoni menshi.

questions.question: Itara ritukura ryitiriwe umusaraba wa mutagatifu andereya risobanura ko kugenda ku gisate cy’umuhanda rigenga:

answers.answer: c.	Byemewe gutambuka ariko barushijeho kwitonda

questions.question: Ahatari mu nsisiro, ibyapa biburira n’ibyapa byo gutambuka mbere bigomba gushyirwa mu ntera kuva kuri:
Amatara ndanga mbere na ndanga nyuma y’ikinyabiziga agomba kugaragara nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye, uhereye imbere n’inyuma h’ibinyabiziga nibura mu ntera ya:
Amatara ndanga mbere na ndanga nyuma n‘ibinyamitende na velomoteri agomba kugarara nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye nibura mu ntera ya:
Iki cyapa:

answers.answer: Gitegeka abayobozi kugenda bazengurutse mu masangano

questions.question: Utugarurarumuri turi inyuma ha za rumoroki tugomba gusa n’igishushanyo cya mpande eshatu zingana zifite kuva kuri:
Itara ryo gusubira inyuma rigomba kohereza urumuri rwera cyangwa rw’umuhondo inyuma y’ikinyabiziga mu ntera itarenga:
Amatara yo guhagarara umwanya munini agomba kohereza imbere urumuri rwera, n’urutukura inyuma, kandi akubahiriza ibyangombwa bituma hagaragara:

answers.answer: c.	Amatara ndanga mbere na ndanga nyuma

questions.question: Ufite uruhushya rw’agateganyo rwo gutwara ibinyabiziga yemererwa gutwara imodoka:

answers.answer: b.	Ari kumwe n’umwigisha ufite uburenganzira bwo mu rwego rw’imodoka atwaye
a.	Mu mihanda itari iya kaburimbo
c.	Iyo azi gutwara imodoka neza yarize muri Auto-Ecole

questions.question: Ninde muri aba utabarirwa mu bakozi babifitiye ububasha:

answers.answer: a.	Ba ofisiye na ba suzofisiye mu ngabo z’igihugu
b.	Abaporisi bo mu mutwe ushinzwe umutekano mu muhanda
d.	Abakozi bo mu biro by’imisoro n’amahoro

questions.question: Ijambo “Guhagarara umwanya muto” bivuga:

answers.answer: c.	Igihe ikinyabiziga kimara gihagaze hashyirwamo cyangwa havamo abantu cyangwa ibintu
a.	Guhagarara igihe kitarenze umunota umwe
b.	Guhagarara igihe kitarenze iminota itatu

questions.question: Ijambo “inzira nyabagendwa” bivuga:

answers.answer: c.	Imbago zose z’imihanda minini amabarabara, aho abantu nyamwinshi bahurira, aho imodoka zihagarara, inzira n’utuyira two ku mihanda, ibiraro, ibyombo, mbese ku buryo rusange, imihanda yose igendwamo ku butaka;
a.	Kimwe mu bice bigabanyije umuhanda mu burebure bwawo bishobora kugaragazwa n’umurongo umwe ukomeje cyangwa ugizwe n’uduce dukurikiranye
b.	Igice cyangwa ibice by’inzira nyabagendwa bigendwamo n’ibinyabiziga, iyo nzira nyabagendwa ikaba yagira imihanda myinshi itandukanijwe ku buryo bugaragara n’ubutaka bwayo cyangwa ubusumbane

questions.question: Umuyobozi wese w’ikinyabiziga, igihe bishoboka agomba gukomeza kugendesha ikinyabiziga atwaye:

answers.answer: d.	Mu gahanda k’amagare cyangwa mu kayira k’abanyamaguru

questions.question: Iyo kubera ubucucike bw’ibigenda mu muhanda hiremye imirongo ibangikanye kandi irombereje, abayobozi badashaka guhindura icyerekezo bagomba gukomeza kugendesha ibinyabiziga batwaye:

answers.answer: c.	Ibumoso bw’umurongo ucagaguye ugabanya umuhanda mo kabiri mu burebure bwawo
